## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test coverage improvement

## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Formatting is correct (`npm run format:check`)

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`npm test`)
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased
- [ ] All tests pass on CI

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated inline code comments

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive information (keys, passwords) is included
- [ ] Contract changes follow security best practices

### Gas Optimization

- [ ] Gas usage has been considered and optimized where possible
- [ ] Gas report has been reviewed (`npm run test:gas`)
